Class Subject

java.lang.Object
Subject
public class Subject extends Object
------------------------------------------------------------ Class Name: Subject Author: Seavhong, Vathanak, Kolboth Course: Introduction to Software Engineering Lab: SE - Lab 06 (Coding Standards) Description: This class represents a Year 2 subject/course. It follows Java coding standards, naming conventions, and limited use of global variables. ------------------------------------------------------------

    • calculateAttendanceScore

      public double calculateAttendanceScore()
      Calculates the score out of 100 based on attendance. Formula: ((Present + (Late * 0.5)) / Total Sessions) * 100
